color_temperature.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for the color temperature. It returns a float from 0 to 1 in the mired scale. Hereby 0 corresponds to the cold white temperature and 1 to the warm white temperature.

*See also: [Color Temperature Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/color_temperature.html#configuration-variables)*

brightness.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for the brightness. It returns a float from 0 to 1.

*See also: [Color Temperature Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/color_temperature.html#configuration-variables)*

cold_white_color_temperature.docs:
**float**: The coldest color temperature supported by this light. This is the lowest value when expressed in [mireds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mired), or the highest value when expressed in Kelvin.

*See also: [Color Temperature Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/color_temperature.html#configuration-variables)*

warm_white_color_temperature.docs:
**float**: The warmest color temperature supported by this light. This is the highest value when expressed in [mireds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mired), or the lowest value when expressed in Kelvin.

*See also: [Color Temperature Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/color_temperature.html#configuration-variables)*
